subject: When can I get a refund? Order number Ssn5375
description_text: I applied for a refund, but it hasn't been refunded yet

conversations.body_text:
Hello.. I sent you an order cancellation email on Saturday but there is no
answer yet.. I want to change it to another one and order again.. Please
reply quickly..

Order #SSN4432

2025년 12월 6일 (토) 오전 8:46, service@simsonn.com
Hi 테레비갓달새,    We apologize for the delayed response. Since it's the weekend, we can immediately adjust your order for you—any overpayment will be refunded, and any underpayment will be collected.

Thank you. Once the full refund is confirmed, I will place another order
with a different card.

2025년 12월 8일 (월) 오후 4:19, service@simsonn.com
Hi 테레비갓달새,    We apologize for the delayed response. We have already processed your refund.

When can I get a refund? It's been two weeks since I applied for a refund

2025년 12월 31일 (수) 오후 5:48, service@simsonn.com
I requested a refund... Did you send it?

      描述:  
 I canceled my order, when will I be able to get a refund for my card payment? I need to repurchase it with a different card, but I haven't received a refund yet, so I can't place the order.  
   
 Order number SSN4432

      描述:  I want to get a refund because I made a mistake in my order.. Order number Ssn5375.. Please answer me
Hi 테레비갓달새,    Sorry for the delayed response. I've already processed your refund. Please check your account.
